tests.code:
const withdrawAmount = 0;
await (0, _chai.expect)(Withdrawer.withdrawCollateral(withdrawer.address, f.Collateral.address, 0, withdrawAmount)).to.be.revertedWithCustomError((0, _errors.CError)(_hardhat.default), "ZERO_AMOUNT").withArgs(f.Collateral.address);

tests.title: should revert if the depositedCollateralAssetIndex is incorrect
tests.fullTitle: Minter - Deposit Withdraw #collateral #withdraw when the account's minimum collateral value is 0 when the account's minimum collateral value is > 0 should revert if the depositedCollateralAssetIndex is incorrect
tests.code:
const withdrawAmount = f.initialDeposits.div(2);
await (0, _chai.expect)(Withdrawer.withdrawCollateral(withdrawer.address, f.Collateral.address, withdrawAmount, 1)).to.be.revertedWithCustomError((0, _errors.CError)(_hardhat.default), "INVALID_ASSET_INDEX").withArgs(f.Collateral.address, 1, 0);
